div.p: The open source model of Viindoo has allowed us to leverage thousands of developers and business experts to build hundreds of apps in just a few years.
With strong technical foundations, Viindoo's framework is unique. It provides top notch usability that scales across all apps.
Usability improvements made on Viindoo will automatically apply to all of our fully integrated apps.
That way, Viindoo evolves much faster than any other solution.
